body: We can't say "this specification" because these are instructions to IANA (they're supposed to stand on their own). I just removed the reference to address the concern you mentioned since we have a link on the previous line..
> line 910 has a Respec-managed internal reference which is now broken and should be adapted Fixed in d6a7bf62b3679e55d5aae7fb2809a61c2de2ae3d.
